year- revealed on the show today( 03.02.11) that she and partner DJ Darren Emerson split some time ago, but have remained close in order to protect their two-year-old son Ben. She said: As you ladies are aware I separated from Darren Emerson some time ago and we have worked through this together. We have come to terms with it now and are now able to speak about it. Every relationship where a child is involved is born out of love. There is a little boy in the middle and he has to come first. There is an overwhelming emotion of sadness but it doesn't make me want to scream and shout. It makes me want to learn from it.
I wouldn't watch the show now because it would be like seeing your ex-boyfriend with his new girlfriend.

This move is a big one for ol' Google, as Eric Schmidt , Page and Sergey Brin have long run the company as a trio, an approach Page articulated quite clearly in the company's 2004 IPO filing: We run Google as a triumvirate. The three of us run the company collaboratively with Sergey Brin and me as presidents. The structure is unconventional, but we have worked successfully in this way. Though it goes against Google's well-worn techniques, Shmidt claims the reorganization won't hurt the company's mojo. In fact, he believes the new management structure will speed up the decision making process.

Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. Reggie Jackson 's really what I did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night
